newsitem.title: USA: Cologne top Lufthansa ex-NY cargo destination.
newsitem.headline: Cologne top Lufthansa ex-NY cargo destination.

text.p: Deutsche Lufthansa AG said it flew 10,879 tonnes of cargo from New York JKF to Cologne between June 1996 and May 1997, making the German city its top ex-JFK freight destination during this period.
Frankfurt headed its list of top originating gateways exporting cargo to the United States through JFK, a spokesman for the carrier said.
A total of 7,796 tonnes of cargo emanating in Frankfurt was transported by Lufthansa to the New York area during the 12 months in question.
The following charts list Lufthansa's top five JFK destination and originating air cargo markets during June 1996-May 1997, and the tonnage handled:
Top five Lufthansa ex-JFK cargo destinations
Top five originating Lufthansa cargo gateways to JFK
